nodes.bodyText: This test class only checks same-origin requests. We should either add a test for a real cross-origin request or remove the configuration related to CORS as it does not have an effect here and could lead to confusion.
The idea of the test is to check if the path of the filter is changed correctly. I will add a comment to emphasize it.
Is it ok to have this configuration run before JerseyAutoConfiguration if some Beans depend on JerseyApplicationPath?

Let's remove the annotation:

It's semantically incorrect since it should be configured after Jersey
Spring Boot seems to be smart enough to figure out the right order of the config classes
